plot outline: Rohit and Adhya are happily married and in order to break the monotony in life, they decide to play a game; little knowing that destiny had something else in store for them. A game in which unprecedented events take a different turn, a turn for the worst and threaten their very existence.
title: Irada Pakka
plot: Rohit and Adhya are happily married and in order to break the monotony in life, they decide to play a game; little knowing that destiny had something else in store for them. A game in which unprecedented events take a different turn, a turn for the worst and threaten their very existence.::Everest Entertainment

Iraada Pakka was released in 2010. Produced by Smita Meghe & directed by Kedar Shinde. Movie is based on happily married couple who are so bored with their daily routine life that they decide to take an uncharted path in their relationship.::Everest Entertainment

Newly married Rohit runs a software company and his wife Aadya is a school teacher life is going well for them.But they get bored of everything going well in their lives and decide to play game in which they will have to fight for a week which will get little spice into their lives.The game of fight's get their relationship in trouble after a week as they have continuous fights.The situation becomes such bad that they decide to file for divorce.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
